mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS( MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , PASSWORD , GENDER , BIRTH , PHONE , CATEGORY , LOCATION_ID , MEMBER_IMAGE_PATH) VALUES( #{memberId},#{memberName},#{password}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{phone},#{category}, #{locationId}, #{memberImagePath})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID AS memberId ,M.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName ,M.PASSWORD ,M.GENDER ,M.BIRTH ,M.PHONE ,M.CATEGORY ,M.BOOKMARK ,M.MEMBER_IMAGE_PATH AS memberImagePath ,M.INFO_IMAGE_PATH ,M.LOCATION_ID AS locationId ,L.LOCATION_NAME AS locationName FROM MEMBERS M JOIN LOCATIONS L ON M.LOCATION_ID = L.LOCATION_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID =#{memberId} AND M.PASSWORD = #{password}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
